includedAssets.title: Straw
includedAssets.synopsis: With Clay trapped in solitary confinement, Jax carefully considers his next move against the former SAMCRO president. Lee Toric seeks revenge for his sister's murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Clay trapped in solitary confinement, Jax carefully considers his next move against the former SAMCRO president. Lee Toric seeks revenge.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Clay trapped in solitary confinement, Jax carefully considers his next move against the former SAMCRO president. Lee Toric seeks revenge for his sister's murder.

includedAssets.title: One One Six
includedAssets.synopsis: The deadly school shooting urges Jax to take immediate action to protect his club. Clay strikes a deal with Lee Toric and a new, no-nonsense Country DA arrives.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The deadly school shooting urges Jax to take immediate action to protect his club. Clay strikes a deal with Lee Toric.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The deadly school shooting urges Jax to take immediate action to protect his club. Clay strikes a deal with Lee Toric and a new, no-nonsense Country DA arrives.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: Poenitentia
includedAssets.synopsis: Law enforcement move closer to tying the weapon used in the tragic school shooting to the Sons. Jax's meeting with Clay has unanticipated consequences.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Law enforcement move closer to tying the weapon used in the tragic school shooting to the Sons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Law enforcement move closer to tying the weapon used in the tragic school shooting to the Sons. Jax's meeting with Clay has unanticipated consequences.

includedAssets.title: Wolfsangel
includedAssets.synopsis: Nero is prime suspect when police uncover the dead body of an escort. Jax makes a risky play when he tries to move SAMCRO into more legitimate business ventures.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nero is prime suspect when police uncover the body of an escort. Jax makes a risky play when he tries to move SAMCRO into more legitimate ventures.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nero is prime suspect when police uncover the dead body of an escort. Jax makes a risky play when he tries to move SAMCRO into more legitimate business ventures.

includedAssets.title: The Mad King
includedAssets.synopsis: With a peace deal in mind, Jax instigates a strike against the Irish. Wendy has second thoughts about her part in Tara's plan.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With a peace deal in mind, Jax instigates a strike against the Irish. Wendy has second thoughts about her part in Tara's plan.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With a peace deal in mind, Jax instigates a strike against the Irish. Wendy has second thoughts about her part in Tara's plan.

includedAssets.title: Salvage
includedAssets.synopsis: As Jax deals with the fallout following the IRA attack, an ultimatum forces him to make a major decision about the club's fate.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Jax deals with the fallout following the IRA attack, an ultimatum forces him to make a major decision about the club's fate.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Jax deals with the fallout following the IRA attack, an ultimatum forces him to make a major decision about the club's fate.

includedAssets.title: Sweet And Vaded
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax and the Sons meet with difficulties as they start to build a new HQ closer to town. Patterson continues to pile the pressure on Nero.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax and the Sons meet with difficulties as they start to build a new HQ closer to town. Patterson continues to pile the pressure on Nero.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax and the Sons meet with difficulties as they start to build a new HQ closer to town. Patterson continues to pile the pressure on Nero.

includedAssets.title: Los Fantasmas
includedAssets.synopsis: Details about the school shooting are leaked, sparking a chain of deadly events. Loyalties are tested as Tara's plan to separate her sons from the MC continues.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Details about the school shooting are leaked, sparking a chain of deadly events. Tara's plan to separate her sons from the MC continues.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Details about the school shooting are leaked, sparking a chain of deadly events. Loyalties are tested as Tara's plan to separate her sons from the MC continues.

includedAssets.title: John 8:32
includedAssets.synopsis: A suspicious Gemma searches for the truth about her daughter-in-law's alleged miscarriage. The wake of a betrayal exposes game-changing secrets for Jax.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gemma searches for the truth about her daughter-in-law's alleged miscarriage. The wake of a betrayal exposes game-changing secrets for Jax.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A suspicious Gemma searches for the truth about her daughter-in-law's alleged miscarriage. The wake of a betrayal exposes game-changing secrets for Jax.

includedAssets.title: Huang Wu
includedAssets.synopsis: With the truth out, Tara's allies begin to abandon her. A meeting with Galen throws a dangerous new obstacle into the path of Jax and the Sons.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With the truth out, Tara's allies begin to abandon her. A meeting with Galen throws a dangerous new obstacle into the path of Jax and the Sons.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With the truth out, Tara's allies begin to abandon her. A meeting with Galen throws a dangerous new obstacle into the path of Jax and the Sons.

includedAssets.title: Aon Rud Pearsanta
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax attempts to seal a deal that could clean up trouble from SAMCRO's sinful past. Plus, the Sons and the Irish band together for a dangerous mission.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jax attempts to seal a deal that could clean up trouble from SAMCRO's sinful past. Plus, the Sons and the Irish band together for a dangerous mission.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jax attempts to seal a deal that could clean up trouble from SAMCRO's sinful past. Plus, the Sons and the Irish band together for a dangerous mission.

includedAssets.title: You Are My Sunshine
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep12 - You Are My Sunshine
includedAssets.synopsis: Patterson promises to deliver SAMCRO an immunity deal. Meanwhile, a desperate Tara grabs one last chance to free herself from the MC.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Patterson promises to deliver SAMCRO an immunity deal. Meanwhile, a desperate Tara grabs one last chance to free herself from the MC.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Patterson promises to deliver SAMCRO an immunity deal. Meanwhile, a desperate Tara grabs one last chance to free herself from the MC.

includedAssets.title: A Mother's Work
includedAssets.synopsis: Jax's desperate search for Tara and his children forces him into a decision that risks epic repercussions. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: New ventures are pursued and life-altering secrets are uncovered in the penultimate series of Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama, starring Charlie Hunnam and Ron Perlman.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New ventures are pursued and life-altering secrets are uncovered in the penultimate series of the award-winning crime drama starring Charlie Hunnam.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: New ventures are pursued and life-altering secrets are uncovered in the penultimate series of Kurt Sutter's award-winning crime drama, starring Charlie Hunnam and Ron Perlman.

includedIn.title: Sons Of Anarchy
includedIn.synopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Top crime drama which follows an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Ron Perlman, Charlie Hunnam and Katey Sagal star in this award-winning US crime drama which follows a ragtag band of bikers in the quiet town of Charming, California. Hunnam plays Jax, the vice president of SAMCRO, an outlaw motorcycle club who battle both drug dealers and law enforcement in an attempt to protect their hometown. Jax, however, begins to grow concerned with the violent direction the club is taking…
